quote: Believe that you possess a basic goodness, which is the foundation for the greatness you can ultimately achieve.
A man who has no conscience, no goodness, does not suffer.
Beauty endures only for as long as it can be seen; goodness, beautiful today, will remain so tomorrow.
Evil is always possible. Goodness is a difficulty.
Goodness does not more certainly make men happy than happiness makes them good.
Goodness is achieved not in a vacuum, but in the company of other men, attended by love.
Believe that you possess a basic goodness, which is the foundation for the greatness you can ultimately achieve.
A man who has no conscience, no goodness, does not suffer.
Beauty endures only for as long as it can be seen; goodness, beautiful today, will remain so tomorrow.
Evil is always possible. Goodness is a difficulty.
Goodness does not more certainly make men happy than happiness makes them good.
Goodness is achieved not in a vacuum, but in the company of other men, attended by love.
Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
Goodness is the only investment which never fails.
Goodness is uneventful. It does not flash, it glows.
Gratitude is not only the memory but the homage of the heart rendered to God for his goodness.
Greatness and goodness are not means, but ends.
How goodness heightens beauty!
In goodness there are all kinds of wisdom.
It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
It is not from reason that justice springs, but goodness is born of wisdom.
Men should not try to overstrain their goodness more than any other faculty.
Mere goodness can achieve little against the power of nature.
No one can be good for long if goodness is not in demand.
Nothing that was worthy in the past departs; no truth or goodness realized by man ever dies, or can die.
Piety is the most solid goodness, and the vilest of what is evil is vice.
Secrecy is the element of all goodness; even virtue, even beauty is mysterious.
Thank goodness we don't have only serious problems, but ridiculous ones as well.
The cheerful live longest in years, and afterwards in our regards. Cheerfulness is the off-shoot of goodness.
The ideals which have always shone before me and filled me with the joy of living are goodness, beauty, and truth.
The measure of your holiness is proportionate to the goodness of your will.
There is no greatness where there is not simplicity, goodness and truth.
There is no odor so bad as that which arises from goodness tainted.
There was never law, or sect, or opinion, did so much magnify goodness, as the Christian religion doth.
To make one good action succeed another, is the perfection of goodness.
True human goodness, in all its purity and freedom, can come to the fore only when its recipient has no power.
True religion is real living; living with all one's soul, with all one's goodness and righteousness.
Virtue is bold and goodness never fearful.
Virtue is bold, and goodness never fearful.
Wisdom and goodness to the vile seem vile; filths savour but themselves.
Wisdom has its root in goodness, not goodness its root in wisdom.
You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
